verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> When the LORD <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> again the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> we were like them that dream. <S%H2472><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> was our mouth <S%H6310><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with laughter, <S%H7814><s%> and our tongue <S%H3956><s%> with singing: <S%H7440><s%> then <S%H227><s%> said <S%H559><s%> they among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> things for them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> things for us; whereof we are glad. <S%H8056><s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> our captivity, <S%H7622><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as the streams <S%H650><s%> in the south. <S%H5045><s%>
They that sow <S%H2232><s%> in tears <S%H1832><s%> shall reap <S%H7114><s%> in joy. <S%H7440><s%>

He that goes <S%H3212><s%> forth and weeps, <S%H1058><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> precious <S%H4901><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> shall doubtless come <S%H935><s%> again with rejoicing, <S%H7440><s%> bringing <S%H5375><s%> his sheaves <S%H485><s%> with him.
